projects.title: Efficient Election Results Prediction from Social Media
projects.description: Analyzed social media data to predict election results using various machine learning models. Developed a prediction system with high accuracy and efficiency. Presented the project in academic symposiums and received positive feedback.

projects.title: Emotion Detection and Music Recommendation System
projects.description: Compared different machine learning models across various performance measures. Worked on different emotion datasets to create personalized music sets based on user emotions.

projects.title: Currency Converter Android App
projects.description: Created a simple and efficient way to perform currency conversions. The app is compatible with Android smartphones and tablets.

projects.title: Music Player Web Application
projects.description: Developed a minimalistic yet functional web application to play music tracks directly from the browser. Provides an easy way to organize and enjoy music collection online.
